title: Two Storied House for Sale in Hendala, Wattala
details:
Fully Tiled Two Storied Spacious House for Sale in Kelawarapitiya, Hendala, Wattala built on 11 Perches Land. Property is situated in a convenient Residential area with all required facilities, Suitable for Residential or Business purpose

Consist of 5 bedrooms, A/C master bedroom, 2 bathrooms, living and dining, kitchen and pantry area, 2 balconies, separate servant bathroom.

Hot Water, Fully Tiled, Ceiling, Air Condition

Close proximity to Lyceum International School Wattala and about 300 meters to Negombo Colombo main road.

Close proximity to Kelawarapitiya Highway Interchange, most important location
